name: impeccably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is perfect, with no problems or bad parts: She was impeccably dressed. The airport was new, impressive, and impeccably clean. See
impeccable
More examplesFewer examplesHer work is well written and impeccably researched.Medical practitioners tend to be impeccably honest, devoted to their patients, and incredibly hardworking.His logic is impeccably straightforward.
